SENT.plain: BehÃ§et's disease (BD) is a multisystem inflammatory vasculitis of unknown etiology and pathogenesis
Coexistence of BD along with hematological malignancies is extremely rare
We describe a patient diagnosed with BD and chronic myelomonocytic leukaemia (CMML) with trisomy 8
This case suggests that trisomy 8 may be involved in the concurrent manifestation of myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) and BD with gastrointestinal ulcers
